original_title: VeggieTales: Dave and the Giant Pickle
overview: Have you ever felt too small to do a really big job? That's what Dave felt when his brothers headed off to defend their country, leaving him behind with the sheep. This re-telling of the classical biblical story of David and Goliath teaches kids that with God's help, even the little guys can do big things!
title: VeggieTales: Dave and the Giant Pickle
